EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #9.2020 Dealer Update #9
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - October 21, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | October 2020 New Sales Bulletin Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2020-18 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-18-Rev-C-RDR7000-Trade-In-Promotion-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Primus 8X0/6X0 Series to RDR-7000 IntuVue Weather Radar Trade-In Program - OIB 2020-19 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2020-19 Rev A - DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms.pdf]]> DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
